text: All the mommy hens are very busy busy
Running round the yard in such a tizzy tizzy
In the dirt the mommy hens are scratching scratching
Soon their little eggs will be a-hatching hatching
All the eggs need nests for their safe keeping keeping
Somewhere soft to lie while they are sleeping sleeping
Pappy Rooster crows out in the morning morning
Waking up the farm without a warning warning
Pappy’s so excited and it’s showing showing
He can’t wait to see how things are going going
Pappy Rooster takes a look and paces paces
Making sure the eggs are in their places places
Pappy watches while the hens are pecking pecking
Each and every nest he keeps on checking checking
Suddenly the chicks all hatch and scurry scurry
Pappy Rooster’s scared and starts to worry worry
The baby chicks are frightened and start crying crying
The mommy hens look over and start sighing sighing
Everyone’s together and they’re happy, happy
The baby chicks, their mommies, and their happy happy
